title: The best games of the year for newbies
summary: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is the definitive version of the game that some people have been playing for over 25 years. Outlast 2 is a survival horror game about a journalist investigating an asylum for the criminally insane. Mario Kart is a game that you can play for hours and never get bored of. It’s easy to pick up and play, but it has enough depth that you don’t feel like you’ve mastered everything. You can play it for just a few minutes at a few hours at a time for all skill levels at a point-and-click adventure.

var g=Object.defineProperty,y=Object.defineProperties;var p=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var r=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var i=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,n=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,t,o)=>t in e?g(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):e[t]=o,s=(e,t)=>{for(var o in t||(t={}))i.call(t,o)&&h(e,o,t[o]);if(r)for(var o of r(t))n.call(t,o)&&h(e,o,t[o]);return e},l=(e,t)=>y(e,p(t));var u=(e,t)=>{var o={};for(var a in e)i.call(e,a)&&t.indexOf(a)<0&&(o[a]=e[a]);if(e!=null&&r)for(var a of r(e))t.indexOf(a)<0&&n.call(e,a)&&(o[a]=e[a]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var a=o,{components:e}=a,t=u(a,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,l(s(s({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("h2",null,"Sea of Thieves"),mdx("p",null,`This might seem like an odd choice for a list of the best games for newbies, but hear us out.
This charming multiplayer pirate adventure was created by Rare, the same team that brought the world Banjo-Kazooie, Conker\u2019s Bad Fur Day, and GoldenEye 007. And Sea of Thieves is every bit as goofy and fun as those classics.
Sea of Thieves is all about teamwork and communication. Players are randomly assigned to one of three ships and asked to do their best Captain Sparrow impression. The goal is to track down and steal treasure from other players.
You\u2019ll have to decide how to approach the task as a team. If you\u2019re all above deck, you\u2019re an easy target. If you\u2019re all below, you might not be able to hear your fellow pirates. If you\u2019re scattered across the ship, you won\u2019t be able to work together to steer.`),mdx("h2",null,"Mario Kart 8 Deluxe"),mdx("p",null,`Another Nintendo entry? We know, we know. We\u2019re as surprised as you are.
But Mario Kart is so much more than a casual racing game for kids. It\u2019s a sport that brings people together, no matter what their age or skill level.
Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is the definitive version of the game that some people have been playing for over 25 years. You\u2019re not going to find better graphics or more features anywhere else. This is your one-stop shop for everything Mario Kart.`),mdx("p",null,`You might think that a game with a reputation for being overly simplistic would bore someone who\u2019s been playing video games for years, but that couldn\u2019t be further from the truth.
Mario Kart is a game that you can play for hours and never get bored of. It\u2019s perfect to play with friends, family members, and even strangers online \u2014 so long as they\u2019re of the kid-friendly variety.`),mdx("h2",null,"Rocket League"),mdx("p",null,`You may have heard of Rocket League. They\u2019ve been screaming \u201Csports-action\u201D at us for years now.
And they\u2019re right \u2014 this game is a great way to get a taste of the sports genre without all of the overly complicated rules and regulations.
And it\u2019s not just a terrible pun: Rocket League is a great game for folks new to video games. It\u2019s easy to pick up and play, but it has enough depth that you can put hundreds of hours into it without feeling like you\u2019ve mastered everything.`),mdx("p",null,"This is one of the best cooperative games for newbies. You\u2019ll have to work together with your teammates to score goals and win. If you\u2019re the type of gamer who likes to shoot first and ask questions never, this one probably isn\u2019t for you. But if you want to play a fun, lighthearted game with friends and family members, Rocket League is perfect."),mdx("h2",null,"Outlast 2"),mdx("p",null,`This one is for the horror fans. If you\u2019re new to video games, you may not have heard of Outlast. It\u2019s a survival horror game about a journalist investigating an asylum for the criminally insane.
In other words, it\u2019s perfect for folks looking to jump into scary games.
As a survival horror game, Outlast 2 is all about making you feel tense. Your character has no special powers \u2014 you can\u2019t run incredibly fast or wield supernatural powers like a certain Jedi. You have no weapons, either. You\u2019re just stuck with your wits and a camcorder.`),mdx("p",null,"If you\u2019re new to horror games, they can be intimidating. But a lot of the scarier titles out there are also notoriously bad. Outlast 2 is a great example of how to do genuinely terrifying well. It\u2019s got some flaws, but as far as horror games go it\u2019s one of the best."),mdx("h2",null,"What are your favourite games for newbies?"),mdx("p",null,"Dragon Ball FighterZ: This is a fighting game that\u2019s easy to pick up but has a ton of depth. You don\u2019t need to know the entire Dragon Ball Z story arc to enjoy this game."),mdx("p",null,"Hollow Knight: This is an incredibly challenging platformer that has a surprising amount of depth and replayability. You can play it as many times as you like without getting bored."),mdx("p",null,"Blue Toad Murder Files: This is a point-and-click adventure game that lets you solve a murder mystery with a cute blue toad detective. It\u2019s an easy game to play, but it\u2019s also got some depth."),mdx("p",null,"Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze: This is a great platformer for folks of all skill levels. You can play it for just a few minutes at a time or for hours at a time."),mdx("h2",null,"Summing up"),mdx("p",null,`Newbies to gaming don\u2019t need to wade through reams of release dates and review scores to find the right game. All they have to do is follow one simple rule: find a game that\u2019s easy to get into.
You\u2019re not going to be able to jump into Call of Duty or Destiny right off the bat. They\u2019re too complicated, too obtuse. Start with a game that\u2019s simple and straightforward.
Play the game in its default setting. If you see a bunch of sliders or options, don\u2019t play around with them. Simplicity is key when you\u2019re first starting out.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

Millions of people around the world play video games every day, and some even make it their career. In 2018 alone, over 200 new video games were released. It\u2019s important to keep tabs on all the new releases so you don\u2019t miss out on anything great. That being said, there are a lot of video games that aren\u2019t receiving the attention they deserve for various reasons.
Did you know that the average video game player is getting older? According to recent data, the average age of video gamers is now 35 years old! That means most gaming enthusiasts probably won\u2019t find as many underrated games as they would have when they were younger. However, there are still plenty of underrated gems out there that are well worth checking out this year! Here are the top 5 underrated video games of 2018:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

It was. But it wasn\u2019t just this past year\u2014gaming has been on the upswing for a while now. There are more gamers playing more games than ever before, and it\u2019s an exciting time to be part of this culture.
There are so many excellent video games released every month that it can be overwhelming to keep track of them all. That\u2019s why we\u2019ve compiled a list of what we think are the best new games from the last few months of 2018 that everyone should play if they get the opportunity:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

In fact, the market for kids games has grown so much that there is now a range of specialist games developers who only make games targeted at this audience. The release of new gaming devices such as the Nintendo Switch, Google Stadia and the Xbox Scarlett has also led to a renewed interest in kid-friendly games from parents and other adult gamers. From binge-watching Christmas TV specials to baking gingerbread cookies and sipping hot cocoa, there are plenty of ways to get into the holiday spirit. And what better way to keep that good cheer going than by playing a game with your significant other?
With so many different board games available on the market, it can be challenging to figure out which ones are worth investing in. Thankfully, this list features some of the best games perfect for couples this holiday season. Whether you\u2019re looking for a light-hearted romp or an intense challenge that brings you closer as partners, these games have you covered.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
